column1: Electrical Power Engineering with Industrial Practice, MSc
column5: Our Master’s in Electrical Power Engineering with Industrial Practice will suit engineering and technology graduates looking for careers in electrical power engineering at professional level.This master's programme helps to develop graduates into innovative professional engineers with a creative approach to problem-solving and a focus on efficient utilisation of current and emerging technologies. It will suit engineering and technology graduates who want to expand their skills or develop professional careers in electrical power engineering related fields.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
